channel.title: Goblin - First in a long time
channel.description:
Lost complete interest in graphics over the summer and mainly did only paid work (not much), and somehow a separate model i started working on turned out so bad texture wise that i needed something to practice on and not worry about the technical stuff.
Heres the result. I did not make the model, only painted it for practice. Im still trying to learn how to do material types but i believe i have enough that i can continue on the other character at a better pace. Boots got a little rushed, not sure how to do leather. Theres alot of small details out of place all around, but i didnt worry about it too much because it wasnt my model (pride thing) [img]http://img176.imageshack.us/img176/2683/gobp2.png[/img]
